Interface Scoreboard


  • public interface Scoreboard
    Scoreboard wrapper interface
    Author:
    Aaron (somners)

    • Method Detail

      • getScoreObjectives

        java.util.List<ScoreObjective> getScoreObjectives()
        Gets a list of Scoreoard Objectives associated with this scoreboard.
        Returns:
        List of ScoreObjective instances.

      • addScoreObjective

        ScoreObjective addScoreObjective(java.lang.String name)
        Creates and Adds a new ScoreObjective to this Scoreboard.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of Objective to add.
        Returns:
        The new ScoreObjective is returned for convenience. (or the existing one if it already existed)

      • addScoreObjective

        ScoreObjective addScoreObjective(java.lang.String name,
                                 ScoreObjectiveCriteria criteria)
        Creates and Adds a scoreboard objective.
        Parameters:
        name - The protocol name of the objective to add.
        criteria - The custom ScoreObjective Criteria
        This can be null to use a dummy non-read-only criteria.
        NOTE: This is only needed if you wish to make it a read-only score, if this is not the case use addScoreObjective(String)
        Returns:
        The new ScoreObjective is returned for convenience. (or the existing one if it already existed)
        See Also:
        addScoreObjective(String)

      • removeScoreObjective

        void removeScoreObjective(ScoreObjective objective)
        Removes a ScoreObjective from this Scoreboard.
        Parameters:
        objective - The Objective to remove.

      • removeScoreObjective

        void removeScoreObjective(java.lang.String name)
        Removes a ScoreObjective from this Scoreboard.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Objective to remove.

      • getScoreObjective

        ScoreObjective getScoreObjective(java.lang.String name)
        Get a scoreboard objective.
        Parameters:
        name - The protocol name of the objective to get.
        Returns:
        The objective or null if it does not exist.

                           ScoreObjective objective,

        player - the player to set the scoreboard for.

      • setScoreboardPosition

        void setScoreboardPosition(ScorePosition type,
                           ScoreObjective objective,
                           World world)
        Sets the ScoreObjective's position for all Players in the given World.
        Parameters:
        type - the position type.
        objective - the objective to set.
        world - the player to set the scoreboard for.

      • clearScoreboardPosition

      • clearScoreboardPosition

                             Player player)
        Clears the Scoreboard's position for the given player.
        Parameters:
        type - the position type.
        player - the player to set the scoreboard for.

      • getSaveName

        java.lang.String getSaveName()
        Gets the name associated with this scoreboard, used for save file. For "world" bound scoreboards, it will be "scoreboard" always. For Canary generated instances it will be user-defined.
        Returns:
        the name used for saving.

      • removeScore

        void removeScore(java.lang.String name)
        Removes all scores associated with this name
        Parameters:
        name - the score's name

      • removeScore

        void removeScore(java.lang.String name,
                 ScoreObjective objective)
        Removes the score associated with this name from the target objective
        Parameters:
        name - the score's name
        objective - the target objective

      • addTeam

        Team addTeam(java.lang.String name)
      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Create and add a new team to the scoreboard
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The new Team
        Throws:
